title: Molochny
data: Molochny (Russian: Моло́чный) is an urban locality (an urban-type settlement) in Kolsky District of Murmansk Oblast, Russia, located on the Kola Peninsula on the lower Kola River, 15 kilometers (9.3 mi) south of Murmansk. Population:  5,208 (2010 Census);[1] 5,627 (2002 Census);[4] 5,878 (1989 Soviet census).[5] It was founded as a work settlement around 1935.[citation needed] This Murmansk Oblast location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
